paragraph.title: I love to create
paragraph.description: Hello! My name is Jun Kadada. I'm a frontend & backend developer working for a web production company in Tokyo. He became a web designer in 2005, and has since developed frontends and backends. I feel that the more I do both design and development, the more I like

paragraph.title: What i am aiming for
paragraph.description: What I'm aiming for in creating a service is a functional and good design that hijacks the purpose of the service. If these three match, an explosion may occur!

paragraph.title: Something important
paragraph.description: Introducing what we value in making it together with great people's quotes

items.body: Find purpose, the means will follow.
items.author: Mohandas Gandhi

items.body: The aim of marketing is to know and understand the customer so well the product or service fits him and sells itself
items.author: Peter Drucker

items.body: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
items.author: Albert Einstein

items.body: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
items.author: James Dean

items.body: To be prepared is half the victory.
items.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

items.body: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent but the ones most responsive to change.
items.author: Charles Darwin

items.body: Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
items.author: Albert Einstein

items.body: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
items.author: Theodore Roosevelt

items.body: Whether you think you can or whether you think you can’t – you’re right.
items.author: Henry Ford

quotes.title: I keep Learning because I'm ignorant

items.body: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it.
items.author: Ted Williams

items.body: Thou shouldst eat to live; not live to eat.
items.author: Socrates

items.body: Just remember, you can’t climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
items.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

items.body: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
items.author: Charles Darwin
